channel.title: How do I create a new page in the Whonix Wiki?
channel.description:
I have found a way to expand Whonix storage (in the case of VirtualBox users) by adding a 'Virtual Hard Disk' in VBox and then partitioning, formatting and auto-mounting it in Whonix, as a much better way to increase Whonix storage than the current offering at https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Grow_Virtual_Harddisk. So I'd like to add it to the wiki to help people out.
It'd ideally be a page at https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Add_Virtual_Harddisk.
My account on the wiki is 'VBox' if it needs a mod to activate it for that ability.
How do I create a new page?
Thanks for your help.

item.title: How do I create a new page in the Whonix Wiki?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
VBox:

So I’d like to add it to the wiki to help people out.

Thats awesome!

If I was to give just one editing Tip. It would be to make content edits in a text editor. When you are done, copy and paste into the wiki template.

That will save you from the frustration of losing session data and having to start over. As I"m sure you know, this can happen after only a few minutes when using Tor.

P.S. Please don’t be hesitant to ask for help if you need anything.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I create a new page in the Whonix Wiki?

item.title: How do I create a new page in the Whonix Wiki?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Due to a specific spam attack, new page creation is only available to
whonix.org wiki admins.

Page created.

Whonix

Add Virtual Harddisk

TODO

Happy editing!

Read full topic

I have found a way to expand Whonix storage (in the case of VirtualBox users) by adding a ‘Virtual Hard Disk’ in VBox and then partitioning, formatting and auto-mounting it in Whonix, as a much better way to increase Whonix storage than the current offering at https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Grow_Virtual_Harddisk. So I’d like to add it to the wiki to help people out.
